name: Sharknado VR: Eye of the Storm
description: Fight your way through swarms of hungry flying sharks in Sharknado VR! Slice them with the Chainsaw, shred them with machine guns or explode them with the RPG!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: intel i5, equivalent or better Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6000 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: intel i7, equivalent or better Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 6000 MB available space Sound Card: any
